hooks.post-update: rm -Rf _site && git clone git@github.com:handleman/handleman.github.io.git _site && bundle exec jekyll build && cd _site &&  git add . && git pull origin master && git commit -am "update" && git push origin
hooks.post-commit: rm -Rf _site && bundle exec jekyll build && cd _site && git init && git remote add origin git@github.com:handleman/handleman.github.io.git && git pull origin &&  git add . && git commit -am "update" && git push --set-upstream origin master
